CustomField.description: If there are multiple records under the parent custom metadata section and we want to identify a specific record, this field tells us what sobject field api name we will use to find the record.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If there are multiple records under the parent custom metadata section and we want to identify a specific record, this field tells us what sobject field api name we will use to find the record.
CustomField.label: Filter Field
